insert: INSERT INTO jsp.files ( bd_seq, mb_id, up_original_file_name, up_new_file_name, up_file_path, up_file_size ) VALUES ( #{bdSeq}, #{mbId}, #{upOriginalFileName}, #{upNewFileName}, #{upFilePath}, #{upFileSize} )
update: UPDATE jsp.board SET bd_seq=#{bdSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, bd_title=#{bdTitle}, bd_content=#{bdContent}, bd_update_at=now() WHERE bd_seq=#{bdSeq}

UPDATE jsp.files SET bd_seq=#{bdSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, up_original_file_name=#{upOriginalFileName}, up_new_file_name=#{upNewFileName}, up_file_path=#{upFilePath}, up_file_size=#{upFileSize} WHERE bd_seq=#{bdSeq}
